MemeDef.label: skyseekers
MemeDef.description: Elevation, both physical and spiritual, is achieved by soaring through the skies.

rulesStrings.li: memeAdjective->flying
memeAdjective->soaring
memeAdjective->free
memeLeaderNoun->aviator
memeMoralist->skyseer
memeConcept->flying
creation(tag=meme_Skyseekers) ->[deity0_name] made all of [deity0_possessive] followers look to the endless skies.
episode(uses=1,tag=meme_Skyseekers) ->Speaking to the believers, [deity0_name] said: "Only by conquering the skies will you reach true enlightening".
intro(tag=meme_Skyseekers) ->[place_summary] [place_name] was always fraught with conflict. The [memberNamePlural] were besieged constantly by their foes, and this deeply saddened [deity0_name].

conflict(tag=meme_Skyseekers) ->[deity0_name] witnessed the contant assaults of a terrible [foeLeader], a war leader, and [deity0_pronoun] decided to give winged vessels to [deity0_possessive] followers, so that they could soar the skies above their enemies.

founderJoin(tag=meme_Skyseekers) ->[founderName], the greatest among our aviators, was warned of the [foeLeader]'s plan by [deity0_name], and when [foeLeader_pronoun] assaulted them a huge squadron of fighters was ready and waiting for [foeLeader_objective].
victory(tag=meme_Skyseekers) ->The [foeLeader] was swiftly bombarded from the sky, all in [deity0_name]'s name.

setup(tag=meme_Skyseekers) ->[founderName] was a pilot, the best of [founder_possessive] class. [founder_pronoun] spent decades of [founder_possessive] life flying all kinds of aircraft, both civilian and military.
story(uses=1,tag=meme_Skyseekers) ->[founderName] understood better than anyone else that true freedom lies in soaring the endless skies, far above any problems.
lessonIntro(tag=meme_Skyseekers) ->The ancient aviators of Earth were absolutely right. They taught us that
lesson(tag=meme_Skyseekers) ->the only true freedom lies in soaring the endless skies
lessonReinforcement(tag=meme_Skyseekers) ->We will come upon our enemies from the unreachable skies, like swift and divine justice.
archistBasis(tag=meme_Skyseekers) ->Archotechs are pure minds, beings of the sky.
archistFact(tag=meme_Skyseekers) ->By soaring the skies we get closer to the Archotechs.
archistProphecy(tag=meme_Skyseekers) ->[inTheEnd], only those who transcend the limits of the earth will also be able to transcend their physical bodies.
animistBasis(tag=meme_Skyseekers) ->The spirits teach us that the endless skies hold the secret to a pure existence.
animistFact(tag=meme_Skyseekers) ->Only by soaring the skies can we get closer to the spirits.
animistProphecy(tag=meme_Skyseekers) ->[itIsSaid] only those who transcend the limits of the earth will also be able to commune with the spiritual world.

MemeDef.label: travelers
MemeDef.description: The world is vast and meant to be explored in all its facets.

rulesStrings.li: memeAdjective->explorer
memeAdjective->travelling
memeAdjective->transient
memeConcept->travelling
memeLeaderNoun->explorer
memeLeaderNoun->traveler
creation(tag=meme_Traveler) ->[deity0_name] wrote [deity0_possessive] commandments in eleven plasteel tablets. The fifth commandment read: "I shall not refrain from exploring the world."
episode(uses=1,tag=meme_Traveler) ->In accordance with [deity0_name]'s precepts, we happily traveled abroad, away from our settlements, to see all our world has to offer.
intro(tag=meme_Traveler) ->The [memberNamePlural] were restless, for [deity0_name] had commanded them to explore the surrounding lands, and they were tired of roaming around living off the land.
conflict(tag=meme_Traveler) ->One of the elders wanted to defy [deity0_name]'s commandments, and close the settlements for further exploration.

founderJoin(tag=meme_Traveler) ->[founderName], the Great Explorer, grew tired of the insolence of the elder, and usurped his power. From that point on, the [memberNamePlural] would be the most skilled explorers in the land, venturing far away.
victory(tag=meme_Traveler) ->It was thus that we became enamoured with wanderlust, and traveled the whole world exploring even its farther confines.
setup(tag=meme_Traveler) ->[founderName] was a skilled explorer. [founder_pronoun] longed for discovery, travelling to the farther confiens of the world.

story(uses=1,tag=meme_Traveler) ->Seeking the thrill of adventure, [founderName] assembled a small group of [founder_possessive] followers and chartered a ship to travel to the Rim. [founder_possessive] discoveries were the stuff of legend, mapping a plethora of strange new worlds and new civilizations, boldly going where... errr, sorry, got carried away a bit there.
lessonIntro(tag=meme_Traveler) ->Humans fear the unknown, it's a fact. It is abundantly clear that
lesson(tag=meme_Traveler) ->we need to explore our surroundings. Being unaware of what is around us is a recipe for disaster
lessonReinforcement(tag=meme_Traveler) ->Only true explorers can never be caught unawares.
archistBasis(tag=meme_Traveler) ->Archotechs are always aware of everything. Being unaware of your surroundings is almost obscene to them.
archistFact(tag=meme_Traveler) ->The archotechs teach us that exploring and travelling are a path to transcendence.
archistProphecy(tag=meme_Traveler) ->[inTheEnd], those who spend their whole lives hiding won't transcend, while those who are infused by wanderlust will join the archotechs.

animistBasis(tag=meme_Traveler) ->Spirits govern everything, from the most abstract concepts to concrete ones. Specifically, each place has its own spirit, and that's why discovering and traveling to all these places brings us closer to the spirits.
animistFact(tag=meme_Traveler) ->The spirit of wanderlust is a powerful one, and instills one with a passion for freedom, for exploration: you never know what the road ahead may bring.
animistProphecy(tag=meme_Traveler) ->[itIsSaid] only those who are able to live without roots and roam free can truly appease the spirits.

MemeDef.label: roadragers
MemeDef.description: For us, the road is sacred, and vehicular dominance is both a belief and a testament to our power. We view the roar of our engines and the rush of asphalt beneath our tires as sacred.

rulesStrings.li: memeAdjective->roadraging
memeAdjective->marauding
memeAdjective->mad maxing
memeLeaderNoun->warlord
memeMoralist->octane priest
memeConcept->cars
creation(tag=meme_Roadragers) ->[deity0_name] cared only for the roar of the engines. [deity0_pronoun] ordered all the faithful to hit the road.

episode(uses=1,tag=meme_Roadragers) ->Speaking to [deity0_possessive] believers, [deity0_name] said: "I myself will carry you through the gates of Valhalla. You shall ride eternal, shiny and chrome!".
intro(tag=meme_Roadragers) ->[place_summary] [place_name] glistened with the fresh engine oil that had dripped from our sacred vehicles, a testament of [deity0_name]'s glory.
conflict(tag=meme_Roadragers) ->A rabid [foeLeader], wanting to get [foeLeader_possessive] hands on our cars, tried to attack with the help of [foeLeader_possessive] many [foeSoldiers].

founderJoin(tag=meme_Roadragers) ->[deity0_name] bestowed our founder, [founderName], with the [relic0_name], and [founder_pronoun] used it to annoint and augment the V8 engine of his custom-made Road Raging car, resisting the onslaught.
victory(tag=meme_Roadragers) ->The massacre was sublime. [founderName] slaughtered countless enemies, and we celebrated by hitting the road mounted on all our vehicles.
setup(tag=meme_Roadragers) ->[founderName] understood that the roar of an engine is the only true measure of power.

story(uses=1,tag=meme_Roadragers) ->[founderName] always repeated the same lesson over and over again: "I myself will carry you through the gates of Valhalla. You shall ride eternal, shiny and chrome!".
lessonIntro(tag=meme_Roadragers) ->It is only by the roar of our engines that one arrives at pleasure. You need to understand that
lesson(tag=meme_Roadragers) ->I am your redeemer. It is by my hand you will rise from the ashes of this world
lessonReinforcement(tag=meme_Roadragers) ->I myself will carry you through the gates of Valhalla. You shall ride eternal, shiny and chrome!
archistBasis(tag=meme_Roadragers) ->The Archotechs understand that power is not just a means to an end. Power is an end on itself.
archistFact(tag=meme_Roadragers) ->The Archotechs will stand in awe of the powerful roar of our engines. It is by their hand we will rise from the ashes of this world.
archistProphecy(tag=meme_Roadragers) ->[inTheEnd], they will carry us through the gates of Valhalla. We shall ride eternal, shiny and chrome!
animistBasis(tag=meme_Roadragers) ->The spirits understand that power is not just a means to an end. Power is an end on itself.
animistFact(tag=meme_Roadragers) ->It is by their hand we will rise from the ashes of this world.

animistProphecy(tag=meme_Roadragers) ->[itIsSaid] only those who let the roar of their engines be heard above all else will be carried by the spirits through the gates of Valhalla. They shall ride eternal, shiny and chrome!
